sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Lupus Education and Awareness Act.

sections.heading: Establishment of the Lupus Education and Awareness Program.
sections.text: Establishment of the Lupus Education and Awareness Program.

sections.heading: Funding. Subject to the availability of funds, the Department may make expenditures of up to $2,500 for fiscal year 2010 for use toward providing educational materials to clinics serving a high percentage of minorities in this State

sections.heading: Staffing.  The Department of Public Health shall provide staffing and administrative support for the implementation of the provisions of this Act.
sections.text: Staffing. The Department of Public Health shall provide staffing and administrative support for the implementation of the provisions of this Act.
